page.title: 19TRANSPORT W'BOURNE VALLEY
page.content: {ROAD} The B3159 which starts at Upwey and runs through Ashton, Martinstown & Winterbourne Steepleton joins the A35 at the school junction Winterbourne Abbas. Good road surfaces to dairy farms for easy access of bulk milk tankers. {BUSES}Two bus companies run along the B3159. One operating between Little Bredy and Dorchester 3 times a week & return and one between Taunton and Weymouth via Dorchester twice a day and return, and between Taunton and Dorchester six times a day and return. {CARS} Most families own a car and a small percentage own two cars. Two or three families have motor cycles and most have bicycles. {RAILWAYS and AIRPORTS} There are neither in this area. {REFUSE}is collected by local council dust carts on a weekly basis.
